nodes.excerpt:
I tried to set up my local Node.js environment to develop my Gatsby.js blog. 
At the ‘gatsby new …’ step it failed with a lot of node-gyp…

frontmatter.title: OS X Catalina | Error - 'gyp' failed with exit code 1
frontmatter.description: If you get node-gyp errors when you install node modules on OS X 10.15.7 Catalina - try reinstalling the command line tools. If that fails - read the full post, there is a fix for that too.

nodes.excerpt:
So I’ve deployed my first blog in Node.js instead of PHP.
What’s involved: Gatsby.js with a blog starter gh-pages Node module to post blog…

frontmatter.title: Hello World
frontmatter.description: Started my first blog in Node.js instead of PHP, wow.
